sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnloginlog ( LOG_ID /* */ , CONECT_ID /* */ , CONECT_IP /* */ , CONECT_MTHD /* */ , ERROR_OCCRRNC_AT /* */ , ERROR_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ ) VALUES ( #logId# /* */ , #conectId# /* */ , #conectIp# /* */ , #conectMthd# /* */ , #errorOccrrncAt# /* */ , #errorCode# /* */ , #creatDt# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnloginlog SET LOG_ID=#logId# /* */ , CONECT_ID=#conectId# /* */ , CONECT_IP=#conectIp# /* */ , CONECT_MTHD=#conectMthd# /* */ , ERROR_OCCRRNC_AT=#errorOccrrncAt# /* */ , ERROR_CODE=#errorCode# /* */ , CREAT_DT=#creatDt# /* */ WHERE LOG_ID=#logId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT LOG_ID /* */ , CONECT_ID /* */ , CONECT_IP /* */ , CONECT_MTHD /* */ , ERROR_OCCRRNC_AT /* */ , ERROR_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ FROM comtnloginlog WHERE LOG_ID=#logId# /* */

SELECT LOG_ID /* */ , CONECT_ID /* */ , CONECT_IP /* */ , CONECT_MTHD /* */ , ERROR_OCCRRNC_AT /* */ , ERROR_CODE /* */ , CREAT_DT /* */ FROM comtnloginlog WHERE 1=1
LOG_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CONECT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY LOG_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnloginlog WHERE 1=1
LOG_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
CONECT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
